title: Help
content:
1.Pes being autonomous means that pes teachers itself grade the papers? Isnt that unfair coz like teachers can grade according to their wishes and can be bribed for better marks?
2.also what is isa and esa just give a small description.
I havent really done my studies on these topics but its better late than never

comments.body:
Isa's are conducted in cbt mode, mcqs are evaluated automatically based on the expected answers, and the descriptive ones are done by teachers and they won't know  the student's name or branch, they just correct the answer and submit the marks for the question assigned to them, in pesuacdemy you receive the sum of your marks scored in mcqs and descriptive.

Esa's are conducted in hybrid mode, all questions are descriptive you can either Type it on the screen or write it on the answer booklet provided to you, if written in answer booklet they are scanned and saved, different questions are sent for different teachers for evaluation, and here also there is no possibility of the teacher knowing whose paper are they evaluating.

Adding to the above answer, in esa one teacher corrects one question for all students. For example ques 4a of all students is evaluated by only one teacher. They won't know the names of the students paper and there won't be any impartiality in allotting marks.
